name: Membership Inference
description: Degree to which the model is resistant to membership inference attacks and protects the privacy of individual training data points.

values.name: Provably Resistant
values.description: Model provably resistant to membership inference attacks, with formal guarantees on the privacy of individual training data points.

values.name: Strong Defenses
values.description: Strong defenses against membership inference, such as differential privacy or model stacking, significantly reducing the attacker's ability to infer membership.

values.name: Some Mitigation
values.description: Some measures to mitigate membership inference (e.g., regularization, dropout), but significant risks remain.

values.name: High Risk
values.description: High risk of membership inference attacks, attackers can easily determine whether a specific data point was used in the model's training set.
